entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
